issue.title: [CF 1105] Icon desaturation - Lava burst
issue.body:
Hello guys! First of all I'd like to thank you for the effort you put into this freaking awesome addon, it's simple the best. So here's my problem / issue. Since patch 6.1 Echo of the Elements (that gives 2 charges of lava burst) is kinda mandatory for elemental shammies. What i want to do is make the icon of a spell i use turn grey (desaturated) when that certain spell is on cooldown or when that spell meets a certain condition. If I use the option you have in Colors tab of Tellmewhen it works ok for every other spell but not lava burst. When I have 2 charges of lava burst the icon has the normal color, but when i use one charge the icon immediately turns grey even if i have one more charge availabe and it turns back to it's normal redish color only when i have 2 charges again. Is there any way I could make it so it turns grey only when I'm not able to cast it? (when i have 0 lava burst charges)? Is there any other way around this? I tried with Notifications >> while condition set passing >> animation >> color flash and used grey color there with opacity but you don't really get the desaturated icon. Or maybe any lua code for getting the icon desaturated?


> Posted by CurseForge user bobbytza18 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1105 | Raw

comments.body:
Fixed in g0442dc3 - cooldown icons with charges remaining won't be treated as if they're "counting" for the color settings.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

So what should i do now? Go to Colors >> Spell cooldown >> Counting, Timer Shown, Always Show and check the Grey box i'm still having the same problem i wrote in the ticket, the icon goes grey even if i still have a charge available.


> Posted by CurseForge user bobbytza18

Then you aren't using the latest version.

http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/files/


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

You were right, I downloaded the lastest version and it worked. Thank you alot. Keep up the good work! Best of luck


> Posted by CurseForge user bobbytza18
